MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW7 postcode area of Winsford. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 10:57PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:57am on 24th January 2021
